items.sentence: Recently Tom and I seem to just keep missing each other. I never seem to be able to meet up with him.
Tom is always sleeping in class. It almost seems like he goes to school just to catch up on his sleep.
Tom rolled out of bed at 6:30, shuffled into the kitchen and put two slices of bread into the toaster.
Tom was determined not to make the same mistakes with his children that his parents had made with him.
My father, grandfather, great-grandfather and great-great-grandfather all had the same name as I have.
